mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (ID_USER, U_NAME, U_NICKNAME, U_LOGIN_ID, U_PASSWORD, U_AGE, U_SEX, U_REGIST_TIME, U_REGIST_IP, U_EMAIL, U_PHONE, CREATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSER, IS_ACTIVE) values (#{idUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uLoginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uRegistTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uRegistIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER})
